Name: erysipelas
Definition: A connective tissue disease that results in increasing fibrous constriction and ultimately in spontaneous amputation of the toes and especially the little toes. A painful constriction of the base of the fifth toe frequently followed by bilateral spontaneous amputation (autoamputation) a few years later.

Name: acrodermatitis
Definition: A dermatitis that selectively affects the hands and feet.

Name: contact dermatitis
Definition: A contact dermatitis that is characterized by a cutaneous inflammatory reaction to repeated contact with an irritant substance

Name: photosensitivity disease
Definition: A skin disease that is characterized by distinctive skin changes

Name: neurodermatitis
Definition: An embryonal cancer that is a type of germ cell tumour that is located_in the ovaries or located_in the testes.

Name: atopic dermatitis
Definition: A dermatitis that is a chronically relapsing inflammatory allergic response located_in the skin that causes itching and flaking.

Name: granuloma annulare
Definition: An interstitial lung disease that is characterized by destruction

Name: pyoderma
Definition: Pyoderma is a skin infectious disease where the infection is pyogenic causing the formation of pus.
Synonym: meningioma of the Posterior Cranial Fossa

Name: obsolete adult soft tissue sarcoma
Definition: A sarcoma that affects adults and is located_in the muscle
Synonym: adult sarcoma of the soft tissue

Name: granulomatous dermatitis
Definition: A Paramyxoviridae infectious disease that results_in infection in domestic animals and humans

Name: pustulosis of palm and sole
Definition: A Paramyxoviridae infectious disease that results_in infection in domestic animals and humans
Synonym: Pustular psoriasis of the palms and/or soles

Name: acneiform dermatitis
Definition: A Paramyxoviridae infectious disease that results_in infection in domestic animals and humans
Synonym: Pustular psoriasis of the palms and/or soles

Name: dermatosis papulosa nigra
Definition: A neuropathy that affect the nerves that control the voluntary muscles.

Name: obsolete cervical glandular tumor
Definition: A neuropathy that affect the nerves that control the voluntary muscles.

Name: spongiotic dermatitis
Definition: A neuropathy that affect the nerves that control the voluntary muscles.

Name: seborrheic dermatitis
Definition: A dermatitis that is an inflammatory skin condition resulting in flaky

Name: obsolete Hodgkin's granuloma involving lymph nodes of head
Definition: A dermatitis that is an inflammatory skin condition resulting in flaky
Synonym: Hodgkin's granuloma of lymph nodes of head

Name: neurotic excoriation
Definition: An esophageal disease that is characterized by an inability of the esophagus to move food toward the stomach resulting from the lower esophogeal sphincter not fully relaxing during swallowing.
